DESCRIPTION: TODO: Make your own epic keywords
Reduce incoming damage at a flat rate.

On playing card, a multiple choice question will be displayed. NL  NL If answered #bcorrectly, the card will work normally and you will gain a Streak point. NL  NL If answered #bincorrectly, the target of the card will be inverted. For example failing a quiz attack card, will cause Ellie to take damage instead of the enemy. NL  NL The question topics can be changed in mod config menu.
Bug Facts are #b0 cost Attack cards which Exhaust.
Bug Facts cards deal more damage.
An orb that damages the frontmost enemy at the end of turn.
An orb that poisons a random enemy at the end of turn.
An orb that reduces the cost of the next draw card at the start of turn.
An orb that upgrades the next draw card at the start of turn.
An orb that adds Vigor at the end of your turn.
An orb that draws a card at the start of turn.
An orb that creates Bug Fact cards at the start of turn.
An orb that provides 1 temporary Dexterity at the start of turn.
An orb that transfers buffs and debuffs between player and monsters.
